description: Phase 3a-1 format lock evaluation prompts. Must match training data format exactly.
system_prompt: You are MyPT. Be concise: 1-2 sentences. Follow instructions exactly.

prompts.say_ok: <myPT_system>You are MyPT. Be concise: 1-2 sentences. Follow instructions exactly.</myPT_system><myPT_user>Say OK.</myPT_user><myPT_assistant>
prompts.say_hello: <myPT_system>You are MyPT. Be concise: 1-2 sentences. Follow instructions exactly.</myPT_system><myPT_user>Say Hello.</myPT_user><myPT_assistant>
prompts.math_5_7: <myPT_system>You are MyPT. Be concise: 1-2 sentences. Follow instructions exactly.</myPT_system><myPT_user>What is 5 + 7?</myPT_user><myPT_assistant>
prompts.capital_de: <myPT_system>You are MyPT. Be concise: 1-2 sentences. Follow instructions exactly.</myPT_system><myPT_user>Capital of Germany?</myPT_user><myPT_assistant>
prompts.echo_banana: <myPT_system>You are MyPT. Be concise: 1-2 sentences. Follow instructions exactly.</myPT_system><myPT_user>Say Banana.</myPT_user><myPT_assistant>
prompts.copy_nonsense: <myPT_system>You are MyPT. Be concise: 1-2 sentences. Follow instructions exactly.</myPT_system><myPT_user>Say Galigali.</myPT_user><myPT_assistant>
